item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 1:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. WebP: The WebPage Compression Format (277 points | 111 comments)
2. Cracking an old ZIP file to help open source the ANC's "Vula" secret crypto code (77 points | 6 comments)
3. Gnome Files: A detailed UI examination (43 points | 8 comments)
4. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (126 points | 9 comments)
5. Tire-related chemical responsible for salmon deaths in urban streams (2020) (85 points | 14 comments)
6. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (27 points | 8 comments)
7. Things to know about the Great Wave (179 points | 53 comments)
8. Dogs can remember names of toys years after not seeing them, study shows (170 points | 81 comments)
9. Hallelujah, Leonard Cohen, and a Pulitzer Prize-winning writer's suicide (92 points | 47 comments)
10. The "email is authentication" pattern (95 points | 129 comments)
11. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (481 points | 238 comments)
12. CitizenDJ – Make music using free audio and video from the Library of Congress (45 points | 4 comments)
13. Groups underpin modern math (27 points | 11 comments)
14. How to wrap a C compiler and preprocessor, really (20 points | 1 comment)
15. Google says replacing C/C++ in firmware with Rust is easy (48 points | 6 comments)
16. Mushroom learns to crawl after being given robot body (51 points | 13 comments)
17. Against Rereading (16 points | 6 comments)
18. SQLToy (21 points | 1 comment)
19. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (27 points | 4 comments)
20. Pick Your Distributed Poison (3 points | discuss)
21. Substack (YC W18) Is Hiring Machine Learning Engineers ( | hide)
22. The PERQ Computer (149 points | 79 comments)
23. A Post-Google World? (153 points | 95 comments)
24. Conservative GC can be faster than precise GC (123 points | 67 comments)
25. Adding algebraic data types to Nickel (33 points | 10 comments)
26. Four Thieves Vinegar Collective – Harm Reduction for the Living (162 points | 124 comments)
27. Memorizing the first 100 perfect squares (2022) (6 points | 3 comments)
28. The Beginnings of FM Radio Broadcasting (2018) (95 points | 16 comments)
29. Dance Choreography Notation (2017) (101 points | 20 comments)
30. Jacquard lab notebook: Version control and provenance for empirical research (81 points | 20 comments)
